title: Jason Riley, Maverick: A Biography of Thomas Sowell
description:
Wall Street Journal columnist Jason Riley discusses the life and career of economist Thomas Sowell. He's interviewed by nationally syndicated talk show host Dennis Prager.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
